.
Identifying Medicaid-Approved Nursing Facilities
Use Medicare’s
Nursing Home Compare
website to determine whether or not a nursing facility participates in a State Medicaid plan.  If this website confirms that the facility participates in a State Medicaid plan, then the facility is considered to be a Medicaid-approved nursing facility.
Reference
:  For the definition of a Medicaid-approved nursing facility, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 2.A.2.b
.
